production.title: Production Process
production.description: From mine to market: our complete vermiculite processing cycle

step1.title: Mining Raw Vermiculite
step1.description: Extraction of high-quality vermiculite ore from our carefully managed mining sites using modern equipment and sustainable practices.

step2.title: Sorting & Cleaning
step2.description: Raw ore undergoes initial screening to remove oversize rocks and debris.

step3.title: Concentrate Production
step3.description: Advanced separation techniques isolate pure vermiculite concentrate.

step4.title: Heating & Expanding
step4.description: Concentrate vermiculite enters high-temperature furnaces expanding the material up to 30 times.

step5.title: Packaging & Quality Control
step5.description: Expanded vermiculite is cooled and subjected to rigorous quality testing.

step6.title: Ready for Distribution
step6.description: Finished products are stored and prepared for worldwide distribution.
